news.title: Megyn Kelly paints grim picture of potential Kamala Harris presidency
news.text:
Conservative firebrand Megyn Kelly issued a dire warning ahead of Tuesday’s Presidential Election — painting a grim picture of life under a Kamala Harris regime.

The eponymous host of The Megyn Kelly Show told the Daily Mail that if Harris ascends to the top perch in the White House it “would just be such a dark day.”

Kelly presented a host of national issues that she feels Harris would fail to address — or even make worse.

That includes issues like immigration, transgender policies, inflation, and the economy.

“How are we going to stem the flow of illegals into this country,” Kelly rhetorically asked the Daily Mail. “[Harris is] not interested in doing that at all, the same way her boss was not interested in doing that.”

Kelly harped on the millions who have crossed illegally into the US since the start of the Harris-Biden administration and also implied support of a deportation plan.

The former Fox News host also suggested that under a Harris administration, gender identity would continue its surge into the popular conversation.

“Trans insanity will explode on steroids,” Kelly told the Daily Mail.

Harris has faced heavy fire from conservatives after endorsing taxpayer-funded sex-change operations for illegal immigrants.

Kelly also stressed in the interview that the economy would suffer were Kamala to get to sit behind the Resolute Desk.

“Our economy is going to remain stalled, and our taxes are going to go up,” Kelly says, “I think all the pie-in-the-sky plans that she threw out there like candy for these leftists, not one of them will get passed.”

Kelly also described the tactics and strategy that she believes Democrats will cook up if Trump wins Tuesday’s election. She claimed to the Daily Mail that she believes Democrats will try and stop him from being sworn in as commander in chief.

“It will revolve mostly around lawfare and trying to get declarations that he’s an insurrectionist, something along those lines,” Kelly dished to the outlet.

Kelly also called out the media for “ignoring” the abuse allegations against second husband Doug Emhoff.

“There’s only one reason this one didn’t get coverage, and it’s because it’s Kamala Harri’s husband… It totally undermines the story they’ve been trying to sell us about this guy being our new version of masculinity.”
news.summary: Conservative firebrand Megyn Kelly issued a dire warning ahead of Tuesday’s Presidential Election — painting a grim picture of life under a Kamala Harris regime.
news.author: Shane Galvin
